adHeader: Private Swim Instructor & Coach English/ Farsi speaking
adDetails: Hi. My name is Hamed, I have an M.A. in Physical Education with concentration in Swimming Biomechanics. I was a competitive swimmer and water polo player in Iran, where I won many medals in competitions. I am certified in First Aid and CPR. I am licensed as a swim coach/ instructor and in hydrotherapy. I have twenty years of experience as a swim instructor. I teach all levels of swimming, including stroke development and technique improvement. I am available to teach at your pool or mine (Martinez). $60 for 1 hour Please contact Hamed at show contact info
